action.description: Passed Third Reading as amended in HD 2 with Representative(s) Kila, Lamosao, Miyake voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Alcos, Amato, Garcia, Kong, Matsumoto, Muraoka, Reyes Oda, Shimizu, Souza voting no (9) and Representative(s) Pierick, Ward excused (2).  Transmitted to Senate.
